data.actual_result: The whole name is used in the picker, which results in it having an extremely large width
data.expected_result: The guild name is trimmed or its actual length is somehow reduced
data.short_description: Long Guild names break the emoji picker
data.steps_to_repro: - Join/Create a guild with a long name (maybe exploit?) [in the attachment below, the unicode chars used to get the results are U+115F and U+FFFD] - Add some spicy emotes to the guild - Click on the emoji picker
